description: FORGE STEEL is an app for DRAW STEEL players, directors, and content creators.
theRightPlace: If you are a DRAW STEEL player, you are in the right place.
heroScreenDescription: In the HEROES screen you can easily create your characters; the hero builder leads you through the process step-by-step.
appUses: You can use the app to track your hero's stamina, conditions, surges, and so on.
appOfflineUses: If you're playing offline, you can export your heroes in PNG or PDF formats (either portrait or landscape).
rulesLookup: In addition, you can quickly look up rules at any time using the Reference button at the bottom right of the screen.
heroesScreenDescription: In the HEROES screen you can easily create your characters; the hero builder leads you through the process step-by-step.
includedContent: All the official content is included, and you can also use any homebrew content your director has created.
offlinePlay: If you're playing offline, you can export your heroes in PNG or PDF formats (either portrait or landscape).
customizeAbilities: Want something a little different? You can customize any of your $t(ability_other) to make them more unique to your hero.
heroCustomization: Need to tweak your hero in a way that's not strictly by the book? No problem! You can customize your hero in any number of ways - an extra $t(ability_one), bonuses to your $t(characteristic_other), extra skills, retainers, etc.
